issue.title: [Gandiva] [Python] Support all Gandiva literals
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3721](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3721). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Support all the literals from <https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/5b116ab175292fe70ed3c8727bcc6868b9695f4a/cpp/src/gandiva/tree_expr_builder.h#L35> in the Cython bindings.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3721?focusedCommentId=16681877) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2920
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2920>
